title: Message to President Florencio H. Arosemena on Panama's Independence Day.
text:
ON BEHALF of my fellow-countrymen and in my own name I send to Your Excellency cordial felicitations on the occasion of this auspicious anniversary.

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [His Excellency Florencio H. Arosemena, The President of Panama, Panama City]
